mapper.insert: insert into test_result_detail (result_id, question_id, selected, answers, is_right) select c.id as result_id, a.question_id,a.selected, answers, a.is_right from test_result c left join paper_question a on c.paper_id = a.paper_id left join (select question_id, GROUP_CONCAT(id SEPARATOR ',') as answers from choice where is_right = 1 group by question_id) b on a.question_id = b.question_id where c.id = #{resultId}
mapper.select: select id, text, question_id, is_right from choice where question_id = #{id}
